languages.text: {n}Рета стискивает кулаки, глаза ее чуть сужаются. Взгляд мечется по вашему снаряжению и оружию, будто оценивая угрозу. Когда женщина наконец заговаривает, видно, как тяжело ей дается каждое слово:{/n} "Ну раз так... забирайте".

{n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."
languages.original_text: {n}Рета стискивает кулаки, глаза ее чуть сужаются. Взгляд мечется по вашему снаряжению и оружию, будто оценивая угрозу. Когда женщина наконец заговаривает, видно, как тяжело ей дается каждое слово:{/n} "Ну раз так... забирайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze is darting over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}蕾塔攥紧了拳头，微微眯起了眼睛。她的目光飞快地掠过你的武器和装备，似乎是在评估威胁。当她终于再次开口的时候，你看得出，她是硬生生地逼着自己说出了这些话。{/n}“既然这样……就拿走它吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾塔攥紧了拳头，微微眯起了眼睛。她的目光飞快地掠过你的武器和装备，似乎是在评估威胁。当她终于再次开口的时候，你看得出，她是硬生生地逼着自己说出了这些话。{/n}“既然这样……就拿走它吧。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta aprieta los puños y entrecierra levemente los ojos. Su mirada pasa a tu equipamiento y armas, como evaluando la amenaza. Cuando por fin habla, sabes que se obliga a escupir las palabras.{/n} «Entonces... llévatela».
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta aprieta los puños y entrecierra levemente los ojos. Su mirada pasa a tu equipamiento y armas, como evaluando la amenaza. Cuando por fin habla, sabes que se obliga a escupir las palabras.{/n} «Entonces... llévatela».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}レタは拳を握り、目をわずかに細める。彼女の視線は、脅威の度合いを測るかのようにあなたのギアや武器の上を舐めまわす。彼女はようやく口を開くと、重い口から無理やり言葉を吐き出す。{/n}「それなら…受け取ってください」
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."

traits.locale_text: {n}レタは拳を握り、目をわずかに細める。彼女の視線は、脅威の度合いを測るかのようにあなたのギアや武器の上を舐めまわす。彼女はようやく口を開くと、重い口から無理やり言葉を吐き出す。{/n}「それなら…受け取ってください」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta ballt die Fäuste, ihre Augen verengen sich. Sie mustert deine Ausrüstung und Waffen, als würde sie die Bedrohung einschätzen. Als sie schließlich spricht, merkst du, dass es ihr sehr schwerfällt.{/n} "Wenn das so ist ... nehmt sie."
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta ballt die Fäuste, ihre Augen verengen sich. Sie mustert deine Ausrüstung und Waffen, als würde sie die Bedrohung einschätzen. Als sie schließlich spricht, merkst du, dass es ihr sehr schwerfällt.{/n} "Wenn das so ist ... nehmt sie."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Réta serre les poings et plisse légèrement les yeux. Son regard se porte sur votre équipement et vos armes, comme pour évaluer la menace. Lorsqu'elle reprend la parole, vous sentez qu'elle prononce ces mots à contrecœur.{/n} « Dans ce cas... prenez-la. »
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Réta serre les poings et plisse légèrement les yeux. Son regard se porte sur votre équipement et vos armes, comme pour évaluer la menace. Lorsqu'elle reprend la parole, vous sentez qu'elle prononce ces mots à contrecœur.{/n} « Dans ce cas... prenez-la. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta, yumruklarını sıkıp gözlerini hafifçe kısıyor. Gözleriyle tehdidi değerlendirircesine teçhizatınla silahlarını süzüyor. Nihayet lafa girdiğinde kendini zorlaya zorlaya konuştuğu belli oluyor.{/n} "İyi madem... Alın."
languages.original_text: {n}Reta clenches her fists, her eyes narrowing slightly. Her gaze darts over your gear and weapons, as if assessing the threat. When she finally speaks, you can tell she is forcing the words out.{/n} "In that case... take it."
